Authors: Hongmin no Zhou, Yu Cheng Dai
Title:
A new species of Albatrellus sensu stricto (Albatrellaceae,
Basidiomycota) from China
Keywords:
Albatrellus sensu lato, russuloid, phylogeny,
taxonomy
Abstract:
Based on morphological and molecular data, a new species
of Albatrellus sensu stricto, A. alpinus sp. nov., described from Yunnan
Province of southwestern China. Albatrellus alpinus is characterized by
buff to pale yellow pileal surface, clamped generative hyphae with
yellow and shapeless oily substance, and small amyloid basidiospores.
Phylogenetic analyses based on the internal transcribed spacer regions
(ITS), the large subunit of nuclear ribosomal RNA gene (nLSU), indicated
that the new species was nested within the genera Albatrellus sensu
stricto. A key to Chinese species of Albatrellus sensu lato is
provided.
